text: Drugs aren t bad  they aren t good  they just  are Drug abuse is bad  Drug addiction is bad  But drugs save my life every day  Drugs  to me  are good  If it weren t for the pill I take every morning  I would be dead  Fuck anyone who says overgeneralizing shit like  drugs are bad  SSRIs kept me from killing myself  Mood stabilizers kept me from having panic attacks  LSD showed me truths about myself I couldn t imagine  Prescribed Xanax helped me sleep when nothing could Taking LSD every week is bad  Taking Xanax presses unprescribed is bad  Drug abuse is bad  Drugs are not  Addiction is bad  Occasional use with a purpose  reagent testing  and suitable dosing is not always bad  It might be  but that s on you and  your  decisions  not the substance  That s right  drugs are sometimes good  Suck it up  Just because you don t take something doesn t give you the right to shit on everyone who does  I know people whose lives were saved by illicit substances like DMT and shrooms  I know people whose lives were ruined by prescription drugs   Take responsibility for your actions  especially with drugs  If you don t like drugs or disagree with using them  that s your opinion  This is mine  Respect mine  and I ll respect yours   Watch the first episode of The Midnight Gospel if you don t believe me Don t underestimate the power of drugs  Yes  they can be bad  but they can also be beautiful  Don t be brainwashed  make your own decisions   By the way  I see people countering my point by making statements like  cocaine was made specifically for the high  No it wasn t  google it    of synthetic drugs you know came around due to a pharmaceutical experiment  Cocaine and LSD  most notably  Non synthetic drugs have been used for decades  weed  ayahuasca  DMT  cubensis  shrooms   tldr  drugs aren t good or bad  your decisions are good or bad
summary: DMT, LSD, SSRIs, mood stabilizers, Xanax and other drugs save people's lives every day. People who don't take drugs don't have the right to judge others who do. People should take responsibility for their actions.

text: Today we had a Maths lesson without a teacher A student in my school got you know what so they closed the school for a few days  Therefore we had a Maths lesson via Skype today  Well the teacher was a bit late  but then we started the lesson  However  the line echoed horribly  We figured out that it is because someone on their phone who has the lesson on speakers  However  we didnt know who it was  So even though we wanted the lesson to continue  as we like the teacher  we couldnt do anything about it  She didnt think that way apparently  and eventually got fed up and left  We got a bit scared  as this is not an everyday occasion  to say the least  and decided to fix the problem  After a few minutes of muting people in name order and then trying to speak  we found the person to mute to avoid the echo  Afterwards we texted the teacher that we have managed to find the cause of the echo and that we can continue the lesson  However she was not available anymore  However  we wanted to give her the chance to come back  So we stuck around  the whole class of   teacherless  just talking and crackong jokes  for   minutes until the lesson was supposed to end  She didnt come back in the end but when we told her what happened she was ok with it and apologised for getting mad There is no Moral of this story  I just wanted to share cuz why not
summary: A student in my school got sick so they closed the school for a few days. Today they had a Maths lesson via Skype without a teacher. The teacher was a bit late and the line echoed horribly. It was because someone was talking on their phone. They fixed the problem by muting the speaker and the teacher came back.

text: My lifeI have nobody else to share this with  or nobody that actually cares  This is the story of my life  i need to put it somewhere and this seems fitting  i started out as a young boy with all the love any kid might have  both parents together in the same house and all the blissful ignorance of being a child  In junior high i met my first long term girlfriend whom i dated until around my sophomore year of high school at which point she left me for one of my friends  at this point i had already tried to commit suicide and cut myself multiple times  i was seeing a therapist and wasn t doing well  i lost all my best friends and became friends with a bunch of absolute losers  i covered my pain with drugs and alcohol at a young age  this destroyed me  i hadn t cried in years and covered my emotions every time i got sad with more and more substances until i had just about done them all in bigger quantities than most  at this point i gave up my last passion which was football  i was at an all time low  then i met a new girl and we really hit it off  we stayed up all night on face time together when we couldn t see each other and fell asleep on facetime looking at each other too  she woke up one morning and told me she just wasn t feeling it anymore  for someone who s felt cast away and not cared about for so long and to finally open up to someone and stop using substances and finally be happy just to have it al shut down on me i can t take it  i was starting to feel happy and excepted and loved after years of feeling like the worlds afterthought  i am here at my breaking point and i can not take it anymore  i ve heard every bit of advice   every sentence of support and i think i have finally come to the conclusion that i am not worth being alive  thank you for everyone who read this all the way through  every person who reads this all the way through gives my life meaning  thank you all
summary: This is the story of my life. I started out as a young boy with both parents in the same house. In junior high he had his first girlfriend who left him for one of his friends. He tried to commit suicide and cut himself multiple times. He lost all his best friends and became friends with losers. In high school he met a new girl and they hit it off, but she left him one day.

text: The older I get the more likely it feels that I ll take my own lifeEver since I was a kid I ve obsessed over the idea of suicide and always just daydreamed about doing it in many different ways  As a teen I thought I would kill myself in my  s  I m almost   now and although I clearly haven t done it it seems less drastic and extreme as I get older  The desire for self destruction has always been there and it always will be  My biggest fantasy is to just disappear without a trace  I don t want to hurt anyone  I guess for now I have to wait at least until my pets are gone so they don t have to be taken in by strangers  I just really want to violently rip myself apart  I am nothing  I am incompatible with society  I m a burden to the taxpayer  I look at my items I ve accumulated and almost cringe that I exist  I m sure that probably doesn t make much sense but my hats that are hung up in front of me  I see them as items that belong to someone worthless  I see this in all my stuff  I shouldn t be here  Why am I here  I hope something happens that will just instantly and painlessly take me away or even better remove me from life so it s as if I never existed  like a stain remover  I m just pointless  I m a shitty person  I have no skills or talents  no desire to fit in with society at all anymore  I ve basically all but given up my art and music  What is the point  All this on top of that primal omnipresent urge to destroy myself  It really feels like my entire life is me talking myself into it and it s inevitable  I guess this is to just get my thoughts out  I m not planning on doing it any time soon although I ve been playing with the idea of planning something for my birthday this year on New Year s Eve  but I m not sure in serious or just testing preparing myself like I have in the past  Sorry for the formatting I really don t care right now  There we go though  That s it

I want to wait until my pets are gone so they don't have to be taken in by strangers. I'm considering planning something for my birthday on New Year's Eve.

text: You know how I knowThat my life is worthless and no longer worth living   One  I absolutely loved cooking and baking my entire life  The last year has completely taken that away from me  I don t have the money for a place to live let alone food I have no desire to lift a finger to cook anything anymore  I used to feel great preparing my kids delicious and really healthy meals every single day  every single meal  Right now  I don t remember the last time they had something I wouldn t normally consider crap All I think about is killing myself  I have completely detached from my children who I used to love so much  Now I look at them and I don t feel anything  I still want what is best for them  but I just don t feel anything   Having worked my whole life for everything I had and asking my friend to store it for me until I found a place turned out to be a mistake  He ruined everything in less than a month  Literally everything I owned is now trash you see out at most garage sales  Now  if I ever do find another place I have to start completely over  Shit that took me   years to get is going to take another   years of my life to build up I have not been patient with my kids  Homelessness is destroying who I was  I feel sorry for them but no matter how hard I try I can t treat them right anymore  I want to die for their sake  I don t want to affect their mental health for their entire lives because of this   All I want is a place to live  Is working two jobs not enough  When did literally killing yourself working become not good enough to have a home  I guess I ll never be good enough  I can t do this any more  I am literally killing myself trying to get somewhere and am getting no where at all  Everyday seems to just get worse I used to want the least painful way to die  but now  want the most painful thing I can possibly put myself through  I apparently deserve this
summary: Homelessness is destroying who I was. I used to love cooking and baking. Now I don't have the money for a place to live let alone food. I have completely detached from my children. I want to die for their sake.
cleaned: homelessness destroy love cooking bake not money place live let food completely detach child want die sake
